channel.title: CVE Feed for JetBrains -- YouTrack
channel.description: The latest CVEs for JetBrains -- YouTrack

item.title: CVE-2023-38068|2023-07-12T12:48:22.777Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2023.1.16597 captcha was not properly validated for Helpdesk forms

item.title: CVE-2023-35053|2023-06-12T15:46:04.269Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2023.1.10518 a DoS attack was possible via Helpdesk forms

item.title: CVE-2023-35054|2023-06-12T15:46:04.704Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2023.1.10518 stored XSS in a Markdown-rendering engine was possible

item.title: CVE-2023-50871|2023-12-15T13:48:13.458Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2023.3.22268 authorization check for inline comments inside thread replies was missed

item.title: CVE-2024-28229|2024-03-07T11:39:59.851Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.1.25893 user without appropriate permissions could restore issues and articles

item.title: CVE-2024-28228|2024-03-07T11:39:59.443Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.1.25893 creation comments on behalf of an arbitrary user in HelpDesk was possible

item.title: CVE-2024-28230|2024-06-04T18:03:09.904Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.1.25893 attaching/detaching workflow to a project was possible without project admin permissions

item.title: CVE-2024-22370|2024-01-09T09:48:57.964Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2023.3.22666 stored XSS via markdown was possible

item.title: CVE-2024-35299|2024-06-04T17:34:32.608Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.1.29548 the SMTPS protocol communication lacked proper certificate hostname validation
